title: Create Login for EDC
custom_steps:
Wireframe: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/67323b8154018a7fc7fb4b2d|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/67323b8154018a7fc7fb4b2d|smart-link], [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/67323cd85c1cd9e119a42a41|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/67323cd85c1cd9e119a42a41|smart-link] 

AC:

* Create a login page for EDC as shown in the attached wireframe
* Implement OKTA Sign On
* Upon signing in, the user should be directed to the Roster page for their permitted Org

title: As an EDC User, I want to see a new Roster Dashboard
custom_steps:
Wireframe: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/67323cd85c1cd9e119a42a41|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67321ec12b9f687e2c8d1dab/screen/67323cd85c1cd9e119a42a41|smart-link] 

Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/4252369003/Roster|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/4252369003/Roster|smart-link] 

AC:

* The EDC Portal layout will match the attached wireframe. The left nav pages will be:
** Roster
** Drug Test Consent
* Upon logging into the platform, the user will be directed to the Roster page
* There will be the following filters at the top of the screen:
** Org
*** Dropdown
*** Not edible by Club users
** Level
*** Dropdown
** Contract Status
*** Dropdown
** Role
*** Dropdown
** Search
*** Textbox
* The table will have the following columns:
** Employee
*** Last, First
** Org
** Level
** Role
** Title
** Contracted
*** Checkmark
** End Year
** Option Year(s)
** Contract
** Person Status
* Above the table on the right - there will be a download icon to download the displayed employee roster as an Excel file
** If the table is filtered, the export will be a file of the filtered data

title: Convert the Major Contract Award Bonus Packages widget to react
SPIKE: Consider using BAM logos in EBIS
custom_steps: EBIS has its own set of logos which are not from BAM. Other EP/BEST systems use BAM logos. Should we do the same to be consistent? Need to look at possible impacts to reports.

title: Prevent BData from receiving picks on API during Prod mocks
custom_steps:
There are times when we want to run a mock draft in Production after the BData team has turned their listener on, so we donâ€™t want them to see picks on the API, but we/BOC do want to see the picks.  BDataâ€™s user account is in the â€œUnassignedâ€� org but this org still sees all Production picks on the API, whether in mock mode or not.  We need to decide how we want to address this.

We will add a new RULE4-MOCK-API-VIEWER permission which will be checked for all picks going out when a mock is running.  Permission will not be a part of any role and will need to be manually added to anyone who needs it (and will not be granted to anyone to start)
